comments_since_last_sample.body: The Milk Toast DOJ needs to grow a pair.
lets be true ..nothing will happen .. the swamp is very deep . .with many skeleton in it ..that is why it is called politics !

I've listened to you saying "justice matters" for 3 years now.
But I have a question.... WHEN does justice matter??? Republicans are blatant criminals and NOTHING is being done. You've devoted your life to the law so I understand your confidence.  But the truth is...justice DOES NOT ALWAYS matter in america
